title: Getting Started with gRPC
summary: This guide demonstrates how to integrate and utilize gRPC within a Quarkus project, detailing steps to set up both Maven and Gradle configurations. It covers adding the necessary Quarkus gRPC extension, generating service and message definitions from .proto files, and implementing a simple 'Hello' service. Additionally, the guide addresses different gRPC implementation types supported by Quarkus, and provides instructions for implementing, deploying, and consuming a gRPC service within a Quarkus application.
